entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
